text: Opsariichthys evolans is a species of cyprinid fish. It inhabits southeastern China and Taiwan. It has a maximum male length of and a maximum female length of . ==References== Category:Cyprinidae Category:Cyprinid fish of Asia Category:Freshwater fish of China Category:Freshwater fish of Taiwan Category:Taxa named by David Starr Jordan Category:Taxa named by Barton Warren Evermann Category:Fish described in 1902
title: Opsariichthys evolans
